T02D2006:213b-0: @213b dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2006:213b-1: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02D2006:213b-2: bcom ldan nyid kyi sku gsung thugs //
T02D2006:213b-3: rdo rje rnams las byung ba yi //
T02D2006:213b-4: rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yis //
T02D2006:213b-5: lho phyogs rgya mtsho pha rgyal nas //
T02D2006:213b-6: de nas gshin rje'i grong khyer ni //
T02D2006:213b-7: ga la ba yi gnas su byon//
T02D2006:213b-8: mi bzad zhabs ni bcu drug gi / lcags mkhar sgo med bcu drug brdzis //
T02D2006:213b-9: ye shes rtse gcig mtshan ma yi //
T02D2006:213b-10: dbus kyi lcags mkhar chen po brdzis //
T02D2006:213b-11: de tshe bdud chen las rgyal nas //
T02D2006:213b-12: ha ha hi hi sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D2006:213b-13: chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa //
T02D2006:213b-14: gzir bzhin du ni rab smras pa //
T02D2006:214a-1: bo chen po ga la ci //
T02D2006:214a-2: dpa' bo'i dgongs pa bdag gis bgyi //
T02D2006:214a-3: bdag cag srog la snying po rnams //
T02D2006:214a-4: tshul bzhin 'bum gyis dpa' bo bzhes //
T02D2006:214a-5: lha ma yin sde brgyad kyi srog gi yang snying phul ba ni //
T02D2006:214a-6: gshin rje'i ya phul ma mos ma //
T02D2006:214a-7: srin pos ra phul gnod sbyin kshe //
T02D2006:214a-8: mi yis na phul sa bdag sva //
T02D2006:214a-9: btsan gyis tsa phul bdud kyis da //
T02D2006:214a-10: de rnams gcig tu dril ba ni //
T02D2006:214a-11: bran du yang ni khas blangs so //
T02D2006:214a-12: gtan tshigs chen po de yi phyir //
T02D2006:214a-13: ye shes lha yis dgongs pa dang //
T02D2006:214a-14: bsnyen pa nyams 'og rab chud nas //
T02D2006:214a-15: lha yi bsnyen pa rab chud nas //
T02D2006:214a-16: sngon gyi thugs dam las mi 'da' //
T02D2006:214a-17: mi 'grub pa ni mi srid do //
T02D2006:214a-18: aom ya ma r'a dza: sa do me ya /
T02D2006:214a-21: ya da yo ni ra ya kshe ya /
T02D2006:214a-22: ya kshe tstsha ni r'a ma ya /
T02D2006:214a-25: rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yis //
T02D2006:214a-26: chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa //
T02D2006:214a-27: gshin rje'i pho nya la sogs kun ;
T02D2006:214a-28: / sgrol ba'i ging du byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2006:214a-29: ma dang sring mo bu mo dang //
T02D2006:214a-30: 'khor bcas kun la bka' bsgo ba //
T02D2006:214a-31: lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la //
T02D2006:214a-32: nga yi bstan pa 'byung ba'i tshe //
T02D2006:214a-34: bka' bsgo ba yi las rnams tshul bzhin gyis //
T02D2006:214a-35: zhes byas dam bcas pa dang /
T02D2006:214a-36: mnan bzhin du mnan por ro //
